about_description: At [Your Company Name], we are committed to delivering excellence in every aspect of our business. Founded in 20XX, we specialize in [Your Area of Expertise]. Our team of dedicated professionals works tirelessly to ensure that our clients receive only the best service. We believe in innovation, integrity, and outstanding customer service as the pillars that uphold our company. Thank you for taking the time to get to know us. We look forward to serving you.

home1_H1: Hi there! I'm Michal Jelinski a passionate photographer
home1_sub: pouring my heart and soul into each frame.
home2_H1: Hi! Iâ€™m Belial an artist at heart and soul, designer by craft.
about_kitchenDesc: Played a crucial role in the daily operations of Focus Restaurant, handling a diverse range of tasks including food preparation, washing, and maintaining a high standard of cleanliness. Responsively executed orders from the chef, demonstrating adaptability and efficiency in a fast-paced kitchen environment. Collaborated seamlessly with the kitchen team to ensure smooth workflow and timely delivery of dishes to meet customer expectations. Maintained a focus on hygiene and sanitation, contributing to the restaurant"s commitment to delivering quality and safe culinary experiences.
about_uiuxDesc: In my role, I"ve been immersed in a spectrum of design projects spanning mobile and web applications. I"ve been instrumental in the entire process - from conceptualization to implementation, creating and refining templates that seamlessly translate into functional websites. Specifically, I undertook a pivotal role in enhancing user interfaces and revamping the user experience for two key company offerings: the mobile app, "Call App," and the primary service tool, "FastTony Smart."
about_uiuxDesc2: Noteworthy accomplishments include the strategic decision to rewrite the home website, adopting the Laravel framework and refining its aesthetic appeal through the use of TailwindCSS and SCSS. This overhaul not only ensured a more robust and scalable website but also contributed to an elevated visual identity in line with current design trends.
about_uiuxDesc3: In addition to my hands-on involvement in these projects, I"ve also taken on a supervisory role, guiding and collaborating with a group of students during their practice hours. This experience has not only allowed me to contribute to their professional development but has also reinforced my ability to lead and mentor in a collaborative work environment.
about_umgDesc: Spearheaded the design and creation of a commemorative logo for UMG"s prestigious 100th-anniversary event, capturing the essence of a century of excellence. Crafted a visually impactful and symbolic logo that seamlessly blended tradition with a modern touch, garnering positive feedback from the school community. Produced a dynamic and memorable short animation to be showcased during the anniversary event, adding a captivating visual element to the celebration. Demonstrated creativity and innovation in translating the school"s rich history into a compelling visual narrative through both the logo and animation.
about_bukDesc: Orchestrated the conceptualization and design of visually striking banners for a variety of student events hosted at Bukszpryt, gaining prominence on the club"s social media platforms and prominently displayed within school halls. Contributed to the vibrant and engaging atmosphere of student events by creating eye-catching banners that effectively communicated event themes and information. Successfully collaborated with the Bukszpryt team to ensure the seamless integration of visual elements into the club"s social media presence, enhancing online engagement and event promotion. Demonstrated a keen understanding of design principles and effective communication, translating event objectives into compelling visual narratives through the banners.
contact_h1text: Write me an email if you want to work with me on a project commission. State your company name for which you want the commission to be for or a as individual. If it is a simple question, use messenger or whatsapp for the fastest reponse.
contact_h1text2: Feel free to reach me if you have a project, idea, suggestion or just to chat ðŸ˜€
form_desc: Fill out the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
banner_Sub: Contact me today for a consultation or project inquiry
about_p: As a multifaceted creative, I blend my expertise in graphic design, 3D modeling, and UI design with a passion for photography and filmography. Delving into freelancing in 2015, I embarked on a journey marked by exploration and innovation. Though my academic stint at a WSB university lasted three years before I opted to pursue my own path, it equipped me with foundational knowledge. My keen eye for aesthetics drives me to craft visually captivating experiences across various mediums. Beyond my primary disciplines, I dabble in web development, enriching my skill set and pushing the boundaries of digital artistry in my free time.
about_p2: Fueled by a diverse palette of influences, I infuse my creative endeavors with the pulsating rhythms and eclectic melodies of dubstep, drum & bass, pop, rock, and rap. Music isn't just a background soundtrack for meâ€”it's a driving force, inspiring my designs and cinematography with its energy and emotion. Whether I'm sculpting 3D landscapes, crafting intuitive UI interfaces, or capturing the perfect shot through my lens, the synergy between my passion for design and love for music shapes every project I undertake.
music_p: Having an extensive spectrum of music likeability i decided to compose custom playlists of music i like listening. They have been named after genres, the main MUSIC is where everything else is. Feel welcome to suggest some of your bangers for me to add there.
